title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - April 20th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - April 20th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. 

Featuring: -Polly Mosendz on the Smith and Wesson smart gun 

-Chris Flavelle on Japan's Fukushima Power Plant 

-Josh Dean on Starkey Hearing Aids 

-Peter Coy on a mini series about inflation 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
